title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. A dialog with the options 'Yes', 'No', and 'Cancel' is displayed. Selecting 'Yes' would save the changes, 'No' would discard the changes, and 'Cancel' would do nothing and remain on the Source page. The dialog title is also displayed as 'Error'.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that you need to save your changes. The user is left unsure about what action to take to save or discard the changes. The error message is displayed as 'Source page is dirty.'
